title: Temperature Monitor
description: Create a temperature monitoring flow that emits temperature readings, filters out invalid readings, converts to Fahrenheit, and alerts on high temperatures.
hints: Use filter { } to remove invalid readings
Use map { } to transform Celsius to Fahrenheit
Create a Pair with the temperature and alert status
100°F = 37.78°C, so readings of 38+ will trigger alerts

testCases.expectedBehavior: Only valid temperatures appear in output
